about.paragraph1: I am 20 years old and currently studying Engineering, where I have acquired solid skills in programming, data structures, algorithms, and system development. I enjoy front-end development and am also learning back-end. My goal is to become an expert full-stack developer, specializing in scalable and efficient solutions. I am constantly learning and looking for opportunities that challenge me and allow me to grow professionally.
about.paragraph2: I currently live in Iquique, Chile.
